Public Member Functions

    Creates a new MC2SimpleStringNoCopy.

Detailed Description

Same as MC2SimpleString but does not copy the string sent in.

Will delete it though.

int  len = -1

Creates a new MC2SimpleStringNoCopy.

Parameters:
str String that will be owned by the new string from now on.
len The length of the string. If not supplied it will be calculated using strlen.
